default_connector: This can be any of the <connectors> keys. Ex: trello

trello.api_key: Your Trello develop Api key taken from the https://trello.com/app-key
trello.token: Your OAuth token from the OAuth authentication
trello.token_secret: Your OAuth token secret from the OAuth authentication

slack.token: The Slack token that you generated
slack.legacy_token: The legacy Slack token available here: https://api.slack.com/custom-integrations/legacy-tokens
slack.client_id: [CLI] The client id. It's used only if you need to generate a token from our tools. You should create a Slack App and use your client id.
slack.client_secret: [CLI] The slack secret if you need to generate a OAuth token from our tools. You should create a Slack App and use your app secret.

g_drive.file_id: [CLI]The Google Drive file to manage permissions by default
